About Me

Hi I am Botan YILDIRIM

I got my BSc and MSc degrees from METU Electrical & Electronics Engineering. My research interests during my MSc degree was computer vision and deep learning. More spesifically, I was interested in training of the deep learning based image classifiers in existence of label noise.

I am currently working as a computer vision engineer in Rapsodo Inc. I love working on both classical computer vision algorithms and deep learning based approaches. I also love working and improving myself in C++ during deployment.

If you have any question or want to learn about me, you can reach me on Linkedin.

Computer Vision Engineer, Rapsodo Inc.

May 2021 — present

-Created a physical model for ball flight to estimate its 3D trajectory in space using flight equations and machine learning
- Used Blender for synthetic data generation in required tasks
- Implemented a 3D pose estimation algorithm using template matching based approaches
- Created a novel model for estimating relative 3D rotation between different views
- Investigated correlation based approaches for relative 3D rotation estimation
- Worked and implemented an accurate ball segmentation algorithm based on classical approaches
- Working on some basic object tracker algorithms
- Hands on experience in C++ deployment and conversion of Deep Learning models to other frame works to increase inference speed in edge devices

Computer Vision Engineer, Kuartis Technology

Feb 2020 — May 2021

-Worked on city surveillance project which includes various tasks such as; person detection, attribute classification, anomaly detection using 3D action features, text detection, change detection, etc.
- Worked on pose estimation for robotic arms which includes tasks such as; object segmentation over real world data using synthetically generated data, 3D pose estimation w.r.t. camera frame
- Worked on wide area surveillance project which includes tasks such as; image enhancement and video stabilization in both thermal and visible data, tiny object segmentation in wide area, change detection, multi object tracking using Kalman Filter
- Worked on a military wide area object segmentation competition named as Y3 and got the first place
- Hands on experience in TensorRT for inference time optimization

MSc Student, Middle East Technical University

June 2018 — September 2022

-MSc Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering

BSc Student, Middle East Technical University

September 2013 — June 2018

-BSc Degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering
